shortText.visible: JIJI brings together <span class = "marker mr-2"> video game enthusiasts </ span> who want to get involved in the life of an association.
shortText.d-lg-block: Developers, artists, writers, anyone can contribute to game innovation through events, conferences and short / medium term projects.

creation.title: Creation of the association
creation.text: That's it, the association has just been created and we are proud to present this site. Regarding communications, we will use Facebook for better organization.

rds.title: React Dynamic Story
rds.text: We are planning a short-term narrative game project using the RDS framework. This will allow us to create a game that can be broadcast on many platforms.
